content: the skeins were 7 ounces/199 grams or 355 yards they were 4/medium weight worsted i used 1 of navy and 1 of white and then almost 2 of the gray i m not sure why people seem to be having problems accessing the pattern i have checked all my links multiple times on different computers/mobile devices and haven t had any problems you may try manually typing in the address kindrascrochet wixsite com/crochet and then click on the pattern section at the top
